modulesynopsis.name: mod_suexec
modulesynopsis.description: Allows CGI scripts to run as a specified user and Group

summary.p: This module allows CGI scripts to run as a specified user and Group.

directivesynopsis.name: SuexecUserGroup
directivesynopsis.compatibility: SuexecUserGroup is only available in 2.0 and later.

usage.p: The SuexecUserGroup directive allows you to specify a user and group for CGI programs to run as. Non-CGI requests are still processes with the user specified in the User directive. This directive replaces using the User and Group directives inside of VirtualHosts.
